text: Turning into cats is awesome!

text: Such good times playing this game, although this wasn't my favorite song in the game
author: Southern Fried Media

text: Got stuck here the first time I played, thought you had to somehow win the roulette/ compass game Fargo cheated at by using the pause trick. Turns out Sneff and his cat magic were the solution.
author: Sephiko

text:
Can't believe you're almost at 2k. Been listening since like 500. You good taste in music bro, hope you keep doing this and always have fun with it.

This song isn't one I normally think of going back to Cross music, but its damn good.
author: Lung kisser

text: @Lung kisser He's not really "almost" at 2k (even at one upload per day, he's still almost a year off from that).  Still quite the journey, though.
author: PsychadelicoDuck

text: Got it, your perception of "almost" versus mine is actually the correct one. Thanks for pointing out I was wrong. You did it, stranger. This was what your life has led up to.
author: Lung kisser

text: @Lung kisser He certainly put you in your place.
author: WhiteTigerShiro

text:
@Lung kisser Well, if you really think about it, I think most people would agree with him.
I mean, you could spend a whole year making a daily comment about how Supradarky is "almost" at 2k until he finally does it, lol.
author: Shadowfury

text: I wouldn't though, because that's dumb. In comparison to when I first started listening, he's close. You people arguing semantics... geez.
author: Lung kisser

text: Literally why dealing with most people is shit. lol.
author: Lung kisser

text: @Shadowfury "Almost" is a strictly relative term.  There is no set limit on how soon something comes to be in order to qualify as "almost" happening.  When something is 88% complete, then yeah, it's "almost" done.
author: WhiteTigerShiro

text: This is maybe my second-least favourite track from the game. It just makes me think about the hours I wasted on that boat not knowing what to do.

text: @Adam Epp exactly. Totally agree

text: You're so right lol

text: I always found this to be one of catchier themes in the game, it puts a smile on my face. The sitar always reminds me of another game that heavily uses it, Breath of Fire IV.
author: SupraDarky

author: CleverDjembe

text: @SupraDarky This song came right back to me, and I played this game one time, and it was so long ago. I love the Breath of Fire IV vibes; that game has some of the best atmosphere I've ever seen, mostly thanks to the great OST.
author: Ryan O'Mullan
